title: Customers SQL 1
code:
select * -- astrisk selects all fields from table
from cp1##.csftrsqp -- enter the table name you wish to search
where seritm = 'R1VAL' -- Enter the name of the SE code you are searching for

title: Promo SQL 2
code:
select * -- astrisk selects all fields from table
from cp1##.csftrsqp -- enter the table name you wish to search
where seritm = 'TSTSE' -- Enter the name of the SE code you are searching for
